I love to go hiking because it's a way to challenge myself and experience the outdoors.
I practice karate in the basement of my mansion.
I was raised in the mountains, where I learned to ski at a young age.
I don't talk about my parents.

content.text: Hey! I'm just about to go hiking, how is your weekend going?
Hey! My weekend is going great, it's the first weekend in a long time without kids around so I'm getting to enjoy some peace and quiet.
I love being outdoors. I grew up in the mountains and I learned to ski when I was young.
That sounds amazing. I've always wanted to go skiing but I've never had the chance.
You should definitely try it sometime. It's a lot of fun. I'm actually going to go hiking in the mountains later today.
That sounds like a great way to spend the day. I hope you have fun!
What's your favorite thing about hiking?
I love the challenge of it. It's a great way to get in shape and experience the outdoors.
That makes sense. I need to start getting more exercise.
You should! It's really good for you.
I know, I know. I'll start tomorrow.
Lol, I'll hold you to that.
Okay, I'm going to go get ready for my hike. Have a great rest of your weekend!
